Title: Episode 4
Plot: Kim has given up smoking and is starting to fell the effects. Den has a secret that she's attempting to hide. Pippa has a moment or two while Hilary is out on the prowl looking for cuts. Matters end up coming to a head following the arrival of a private patient and the search for a side ward, with Dr Kersley putting on the pressure.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
